column5: Hi, ive recently started fishing and i'm interested in knowing the best place for a beginner to go fish, someplace where fish are easier to catch in mississauga. thank you
Welcome to the forum! I sent you a PM with some info!
Welcome to the board you might look to see if their are any local parks in the area to start with.  Art
go to montsberg conservation area near milton. Theres a lot of panfish in there makes for a fun afternoon not allowed to use live bait though.
